strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
What are your plans this weekend? Here are a few ideas:

  • Jam out: Check out KUAF's list of live music happening in Northwest Arkansas this weekend.
  • Man, I feel like a woman: See what the fuss over Tootsie is all about this weekend at Walton Arts Center during one of its final four performances.
  • Folk out: Catch the last few days of the OzMaMu festival in Eureka Springs this weekend at Basin Park Hotel!
  • Sneak peek: Join Arkansas Public Theatre for their SeasonLeaks! Announcement Event for Season 38 at 7p tonight at the historic Victory Theater in Downtown Rogers.
  • Frostbite: Run the Kessler Mountain Trails till your toes go numb during Fayetteville's Frozen Toes 5K & 15K tomorrow morning, Jan 21, at 9a.
  • Day game: The Razorbacks men's basketball team takes on Ole Miss at Bud Walton Arena Saturday, Jan 21, at 11a.
  • Reimagine: Check out the new artwork at the Momentary, including spoken-word monologue and "live-action juke-box" by artists Guillermo Gómez-Peña & Balitronica Gómez on Saturday, Jan 21, at 7:30p.
  • Gettin' hitched: The Apollo on Emma invites you to meet Northwest Arkansas's top wedding and event vendors during the 5th Annual Wedding Fair this Sunday, Jan 22, from 12-4p.

Tag us on Instagram with pics of you enjoying your weekend to let us know where you ended up!
